history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00059
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEES ON POVERTY ALLEVIATION AND PEOPLEꞌS PARTICIPATION TO CONDUCT A JOINT INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE INVOLVEMENT OF CIVIL SOCIETY ORGANIZATIONS (CSOs) IN THE IMPLEMENTATION AND OVERSIGHT OF THE PANTAWID PAMILYANG PILIPINO PROGRAM (4Ps)
